Climate Change Threats to Coral Reefs

Coral reefs are among the planet’s most diverse—and most vulnerable—ecosystems. Rising sea temperatures and acidification drive mass bleaching, threatening food security and coastal protection for hundreds of millions.

Strikes Rise on Climate Global Challenges

From student walkouts to labor union stoppages, millions worldwide are striking for bold, immediate climate action—pushing governments to declare emergencies and phase out fossil fuels.
